people_also_ask.question: Is Donkey Kong a bad guy?
people_also_ask.heading: Type of Villain Donkey Kong, also known as Donkey Kong Sr., is the titular main antagonist of the Donkey Kong arcade games, serving as the titular main antagonist of Donkey Kong and Donkey Kong 3, and the deuteragonist of Donkey Kong Jr. He later appears as Cranky Kong in the Donkey Kong franchise.
people_also_ask.title: Donkey Kong (Donkey Kong) | Villains Wiki

people_also_ask.title: 13 Things You Might Not Know About 'Donkey Kong' - Mental ...

people_also_ask.question: Why is Donkey Kong called Donkey Kong?
people_also_ask.heading: Miyamoto used "donkey" to convey "stubborn" in English; while "Kong" was just a generic term for large apes in Japan, the name Donkey Kong was intended to convey "stubborn ape" to the American audience. When he suggested this name to Nintendo of America, people laughed, but the name stuck.

knowledge_panel.description: donkey kong is a video game series created by shigeru miyamoto. it follows the adventures of an ape named donkey kong and his clan of other apes and monkeys. the franchise primarily consists of platform games, originally single-screen action puzzle games and later side-scrolling platformers. wikipedia
